text.section:
The work authorization required by § 4-402 of this subtitle for dental laboratory work shall:
Be on the form that the Board requires;
Be signed by a licensed dentist who requests the work; and
Contain the information required by this section.

A dental laboratory named in a work authorization may subcontract dental laboratory work, if that dental laboratory:
Completes in duplicate the subcontracted work authorization form that the Board requires; and
Complies with the record keeping requirements of § 4-404 of this subtitle.

The Board shall publish:
An approved standard work authorization form; and
An approved standard subcontracted work authorization form that is of a color different from the standard work authorization form.

A dental laboratory in this State may do dental laboratory work on the request of a dentist licensed and practicing in any other state or a foreign country if the request:
Is on the form that the Board requires or a reasonably equivalent form; and
Otherwise meets the requirements of this subtitle.
